title: Did the Soviet Union ban microwaves because of health concerns?
subtitle: This allegation has its roots in an unsourced article by a man who is likely not to exist, whose only known experience came from working in an alternative library and a natural food shop in the 1970s.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Microwave furnaces in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics were banned in 1976 to protect their citizens from harmful health effects.
